trans-unit.source: You must specify either --sdk or --runtime.
trans-unit.target: You must specify either --sdk or --runtime.

trans-unit.target: The specified version is not valid: "{0}".

trans-unit.target: You cannot specify a version for option: {0}.

trans-unit.source: The current user does not have adequate privileges. See https://aka.ms/dotnet-cleanup.
trans-unit.target: The current user does not have adequate privileges. See https://aka.ms/dotnet-cleanup.

trans-unit.target: This command is not supported on this operating system.

trans-unit.target: You must specify only one of the options: {0}.

trans-unit.target: Required argument missing for the uninstall command.

trans-unit.source: Remove .NET Core Runtimes only.
trans-unit.target: Remove .NET Core Runtimes only.

trans-unit.source: Remove .NET Core SDKs only.
trans-unit.target: Remove .NET Core SDKs only.

trans-unit.source: The specified version is not found: {0}.
trans-unit.target: The specified version is not found: {0}.

trans-unit.source: VERSION
trans-unit.target: VERSION

trans-unit.source: Remove .NET Core SDKs or Runtimes below the specified version. The specified version will remain.
trans-unit.target: Remove .NET Core SDKs or Runtimes below the specified version. The specified version will remain.

trans-unit.source: Remove .NET Core SDKs or Runtimes, except the one highest version.
trans-unit.target: Remove .NET Core SDKs or Runtimes, except the one highest version.

trans-unit.source: VERSIONS
trans-unit.target: VERSIONS

trans-unit.source: Remove .NET Core SDKs or Runtimes, except those specified.
trans-unit.target: Remove .NET Core SDKs or Runtimes, except those specified.

trans-unit.source: Remove .NET Core SDKs or Runtimes that have been superceded by higher patches.
trans-unit.target: Remove .NET Core SDKs or Runtimes that have been superceded by higher patches.

trans-unit.source: Remove all .NET Core SDKs or Runtimes.
trans-unit.target: Remove all .NET Core SDKs or Runtimes.

trans-unit.source: Remove .NET Core SDKs or Runtimes that are marked as previews, except the one highest preview.
trans-unit.target: Remove .NET Core SDKs or Runtimes that are marked as previews, except the one highest preview.

trans-unit.source: Remove .NET Core SDKs or Runtimes that are marked as previews.
trans-unit.target: Remove .NET Core SDKs or Runtimes that are marked as previews.

trans-unit.source: MAJOR_MINOR
trans-unit.target: MAJOR_MINOR

trans-unit.source: Remove .NET Core SDKs or Runtimes that match the specified `major.minor` version.
trans-unit.target: Remove .NET Core SDKs or Runtimes that match the specified `major.minor` version.

trans-unit.source: The specified versions to uninstall.
trans-unit.target: The specified versions to uninstall.

trans-unit.source: VERSIONS
trans-unit.target: VERSIONS

trans-unit.source: Remove specified .NET Core SDKs or Runtimes. This tool can only uninstall items that were installed using .NET Core SDK or Runtime installers.
trans-unit.target: Remove specified .NET Core SDKs or Runtimes. This tool can only uninstall items that were installed using .NET Core SDK or Runtime installers.

trans-unit.source: LEVEL
trans-unit.target: LEVEL

trans-unit.source: Set the verbosity level. Allowed values are q[uiet], m[inimal], n[ormal], d[etailed], and diag[nostic].
trans-unit.target: Set the verbosity level. Allowed values are q[uiet], m[inimal], n[ormal], d[etailed], and diag[nostic].

trans-unit.target: Timeout during uninstall: {0}.

trans-unit.target: The uninstallation operation failed. Exit code was {1} for {0}.
